description.title: Technical Writing
description: As a technical manager for a large database company, Mark has a background in all phases of software planning, design, construction, implementation, marketing and support. He can take a software produ…

services.title: Articles, Blog Posts and Web Content
description: Mark has written articles on topics ranging from heeding the warning of chest pain to how to brush your cat's teeth. He varies the tone depending on the expected audience and purpose of the article.

abstrac: Quality writing backed by years of "field work".
bio:
Mark's experience in health care, business and technology allows him to create products that meet the needs of his client's audience. Whether the product is for education, marketing or is a call to action, Mark knows how to connect with the reader.

While content is important, so is the tone. Mark knows when it's important to write in a conversational tone and when to present material like a lecturer. He can write to varying levels of reader education and background. With every assignment, Mark asks himself "How should I approach this piece so the reader gets the most benefit from the content?"

A professional and authoritative piece flows logically, uses correct grammar, spelling and punctuation. With thousands of projects completed, Mark knows the techniques to make sure each piece meets the level of quality expected by his clients.

Mark works on a variety of assignments to maintain an interesting mixture of writing. While he enjoys writing about the topics with which he is most familiar, he also chooses assignments in areas requiring research to further expand his own knowledge.

There is power in words and Mark knows how to best use them whether the project is to enhance the SEO of a software startup web site or to educate seniors on what to expect when recovering from a total hip joint replacement.

bio:
We are a digital production studio that produces 3D animation, presentation videos, creatives and print design material.

Our team consists of highly experienced designers and video production professionals. This allows us to work as a cohesive unit when creating campaigns across a range of mediums to develop and communicate brands successfully to your target audience.

We prefer to start a project after a discussion of general information and any questions that either of us may have. 

Communication
You can email  at contact@nyasacreations.com at any time and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. We also guarantee a 24 hour turn around on all communications.

Payment
Final payment is required before final files are delivered. All payments to be done through Paypal. On projects over $1000, an advance deposit of 25% is required.

bio:
After strenuous hardwork, polished skills and years of experience, we have a team that becomes the brain behind your imagination. We believe that our success lies behind yours. Hence, for us to gain success, it is necessary for us to help you gain one. Our innovative solutions, technologically driven workforce and pioneering practices help you optimize, expand and boost business processes, and provide a significant growth.

We use expert and professional project management, intuitive course plotting, creative designs and latest software engineering methods to create a sustainable competitive advantage for you to help you lead ahead of your competitors. Nonetheless, our main aim is to help you have a minimum cost for the maximum best product and/or service.

bio:
My name is Alex Kaban. I am strong system analyst and have perfect education from famous university of Ukraine - National  Technical  University  of  Ukraine  (KPI). I have good experience in different types of math, computer science.
As the Processing Centre specialist I participated in projects including integration of different types of modules: Processing Centre servers (communication, DB); WebSphere MQ; Web, Billing, Mobile gates; Payment Systems units; HSM units.
I performed Payment Systems certifications, migrations; implemented financial services via terminals (ATM, POS, Web-banking, Kiosks); developed multithreads channels with its internal business logics between processing centres, banks; developed virtual kiosks, pos terminals.
I like organizing walking-tours of the city (Kyiv) for my friends: sights, historical streets itineraries, city secret places in architectural, historical, significant aspects.
I love FC Dynamo (Kyiv)!

description.title: Embedded Software Development
description: Development of embedded software for the customer's target H/W platform according to the given requirements and specification: bootloader code, device drivers, real time application code.

bio:
I am a C/C++ software engineer with a PhD in Video Coding and several years experience in embedded system design. Throughout my career I have delivered projects for a variety of produc: audio streaming, medical devices, IP cameras, networked video recorders. I have developed embedded software for a variety of systems ranging from complex SoC running Linux to microcontrollers with an RTOS kernel or no OS.
My key areas of expertise are:

    - Programming and scripting languages: C, C++, Python, Perl
    - Linux kernel programming, drivers, device trees
    - U-Boot
    - Buildroot, Yocto
    - Microcontrollers and SoCs (MSP430, PIC, STM32, Freescale i.MX28, i.MX6, Atmel AT91SAM9)
    - Bus protocols (RS-232, RS-485, I2C, SPI,  HDMI-CEC, Modbus)
    - Bluetooth 4.0 (Cypress PSoC, Bluegiga)
    - FreeRTOS
    - Open source software
    - Digital Signal Processing
    - Networking: Ethernet, TCP/IP, sockets
    - S/W configuration management: Git, Subversion

Employment History:
* Linn Products, Senior Software Engineer, Nov. 2011 - Present
* Aircraft Medical, Senior Firmware Engineer, Feb. 2010 - Oct. 2011
* Indigovision, Senior Software Engineer, Jun. 2001 - Jan. 2010
* Tality UK, Consulting Engineer, Dec. 2001 - May 2001
* CRL, Principal Software Engineer, Jun. 1999 - Nov. 2001
Available 18 - 25 hours/week
